name: places/ChIJMRrpBx70wokRxcwjbHM3KzU
adrFormatAddress: 4305 Broadway, New York, NY 10033-3723, USA

originalText.text: Under the new ownership this place has turned into a s**t show. The wash and fold service has went up in price and gotten worse losing bags of clothes giving you back other peoples clothes and not knowing where yours have went. Then they say they’ll keep an eye out for it if anyone returns it. I have lost over $600 in clothes from using this service here and ownership doesn’t take any responsibilities for their employees mistakes and missing items. There is always something missing from their wash and fold service. Do not take you expensive clothes here they will come up missing! Pay the extra .15 cents a pound up the street at the spot on 184 and Saint Nicholas where they actually return all the items that you bring without a hassle. Or anywhere else for that matter because you don’t want to lose your clothes coming here. The old owners never lost any of my items and I had been coming here for years. New ownership is terrible.

originalText.text: Ever since this laundromat was sold off from the lovely couple it went down in quality they got rid of the original staff in charge of the wash and fold service started to charge more and took longer to return the clothes but the quality took a large dip. They ruined all my socks and underwear by drying in extreme heat. I feel like I wasted my money by going here after the change. I changed over to the laundromat on 181 and Bennett.

originalText.text: First absolutely NO HOT WATERin any of the machines when I asked her about it she yelled at me that there's no hot water everybody knows there's hot water and then it takes forever putting the quarters in the machine that usually don't work and then you have to call her to put them in anyhow wirstlaundromat experience of my life
